lead_paragraph: Sixty-nine people suspected of being supporters of the Muslim Brotherhood were sentenced to 25 years in prison on Wednesday for burning a church in a village near Cairo in 2013.

headline.main: Egypt: 69 Are Sentenced to Long Prison Terms for Burning a Church
headline.print_headline: Egypt: 69 Are Sentenced to Long Prison Terms for Burning a Church

snippet: Sixty-nine people suspected of being supporters of the Muslim Brotherhood were sentenced to 25 years in prison on Wednesday for burning a church in a village near Cairo in 2013.
